[[inst_b_ioti]]
==== B.IOTI

*Syntax:* B.IOTI [SrcTile0<.reuse>, SrcTile1<.reuse>],  group=0, ->DstTile<Size>

*Description:* Block I/O: performs input/output operations at block level.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_b_ioti.svg[B.IOTI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* CMD/BLOCK_IO
